Get ready for the thrills and spills of huge jumps, loops and drops in a rollercoaster game like no other! Brought to you by Digital Chocolate.Xperia PLAY optimized

reviews.title: .Quite bad but ok
reviews.comment: The game is ok, but a bit slow. Buttons in game play is hard to press. This game is better on my older phone. Please update to make it easier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Underrated game! Please fix fhe random lag when in the pause menu... only thing stopping it fom getting 5 stars. Also, music but no SFX?
